content.title: Pronunciation Practice - A1 Course Completion
content.instructions: Congratulations! Practice these final sentences covering key A1 topics. Focus on overall fluency and confidence.
focusPoints: Clear articulation of all sounds learned

targetSentences.text: I'd like to order a pizza and a salad, please.
targetSentences.phonetic: /aɪd laɪk tuː ˈɔːdə ə ˈpiːtsə ænd ə ˈsæləd, pliːz/

targetSentences.text: Could you recommend a good restaurant near here?
targetSentences.phonetic: /kʊd juː ˌrekəˈmend ə ɡʊd ˈrestərɒnt nɪə hɪə/

targetSentences.text: I've learned so much English this year!
targetSentences.phonetic: /aɪv lɜːnd səʊ mʌtʃ ˈɪŋɡlɪʃ ðɪs jɪə/

content.prompt: Reflect on your A1 English journey. What have you learned? What are your goals for A2? Tell me about your favorite topic from the course.
content.expectedResponse: I've learned a lot in this A1 course. I can now introduce myself, talk about my family and daily routines, give directions, and order food in a restaurant. My favorite topic was learning about travel and hotels. For A2, I want to improve my grammar and learn more vocabulary to have longer conversations.
hints: Mention 3-4 topics you studied (family, food, travel, directions, etc.)
Share your favorite topic and why
Talk about your future learning goals
Use past tense to describe what you learned
